changelog: Added AutoTNT
Added powder snow to Solidify
Added HungerCheck to sprint
Removed AutoIstackDupe & Dispenser32k
Removed ChunkSize from UI because it caused problems + was unreliable
Improved Notebot
- Fixed the play a song cutting off notes and changed the text to "Preview" to make it more clear what it does
- Made Notebot be able to load midi and nbs files
- Made the notebot gui show the author of the song if it contains it
- Made the notebot window bigger on smaller displays
Fixed AutoArmor trying to equip armor when in chests
Fixed $prefix not working correctly
Fixed the account manager not loading accounts properly
Fixed the game crashing when trying to login with a no auth account that doesn't exist
Fixed a possible crash when editing block settings
Rewritten Module Manager (should hopefully improve performance)
Fixed button settings breaking setting saving
Fixed Microsoft defender false flagging the BH jar as malware?
$setting now uses setting names instead of indices
Replaced DiscordRPC with DiscordIPC which doesn't use 500kb of libraries + adds the ability to use spectate/join buttons
Updated to 1.18.2
